alert.note: Alert for Marathon; Portage; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 9:11AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHERN WOOD...NORTHWESTERN PORTAGE AND MARATHON COUNTIES THROUGH 1015 AM CDT... At 909 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated several strong thunderstorms moving east at 35 mph through southwest Marathon and Clark counties. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Wausau, Marshfield, Weston, Rib Mountain, Mosinee, Spencer, Bevent, Rothschild, Schofield, and Knowlton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
